nescent.phylogeoref.reader.utility
Class PhyloUtility

java.lang.Object
  nescent.phylogeoref.reader.utility.PhyloUtility

public class PhyloUtility
extends java.lang.Object

Provides the necessary utility functions while transforming a parsed NeXML document into a Phylogeny tree.
It is important to note that there are two nodes and edges used in this class.
(1) org.forester.phylogeny.PhylogenyNode
(2) org.nexml.model.Node

A successful transformation will grab all the data from a Node and put it into the PhylogenyNode.

Similarly there are two edges.
(1) org.nexml.model.Edge
(2) org.forester.phylogeny.Edge

Constructor Summary
PhyloUtility()
           
 
Method Summary
static void attachLocationMetadata(Node node, PhylogenyNode phyNode)
          Attaches latitude and longitudes to each node.
The latitude/longitude metadata can be attached to the node in two ways.
1) Either in the OTU which is referenced by this node.
2) Or directly within this node.

Caveat: Should be called only for external nodes.
static void attachOtherMetadata(Node node, PhylogenyNode phyNode)
          Maps the various metadata properties to a phylogeny node.
This function may require a revision because a perfect mapping between NeXML and Phylogeny object doesn't exist.
static Node getRootNode(Network<FloatEdge> network)
          Finds and returns the root node of the tree.
static void setDistanceToParent(Edge edge, PhylogenyNode node)
          Sets the distance of PhylogenyNode node from its parent.
static PhylogenyNode toPhylogenyNode(Node node)
          Transforms Node to a PhylogenyNode.
Does not attach the metadata.

Transforms Node to a PhylogenyNode.

attachLocationMetadata

public static void attachLocationMetadata(Node node,
                                          PhylogenyNode phyNode)
Attaches latitude and longitudes to each node.
The latitude/longitude metadata can be attached to the node in two ways.
1) Either in the OTU which is referenced by this node.
2) Or directly within this node.

Caveat: Should be called only for external nodes.

Parameters:
node - the node in nexml document
phyNode - the phylogeny tree node
See Also:


attachOtherMetadata

public static void attachOtherMetadata(Node node,
                                       PhylogenyNode phyNode)
Maps the various metadata properties to a phylogeny node.
This function may require a revision because a perfect mapping between NeXML and Phylogeny object doesn't exist. Since the forester library was made keeping the PhyloXML format in mind.

TODO: This URI needs to be checked,however it's not used because of the leniency of the api.
